address-selection--page-description: We’ll send any important information about this application to this address.
address-selection--label-text: have the same mailing address as one previously entered in this application?
applicants--marriage-date-title: date of marriage to the Veteran
applicants--marriage-date-description: If you don’t know the exact date, enter your best guess. We won’t need the marriage certificate unless we can’t find a record of the marriage in our system.
applicants--marriage-proof-title: Upload proof of parent’s marriage or legal union
applicants--marriage-proof-label: Upload proof of marriage or legal union
applicants--personal-info-title: Applicant name and date of birth
applicants--personal-info-description: Enter this information for each applicant you’re applying for.
attachments--hint-text: Upload front and back as separate files.
health-insurance--cancel-add-description: If you cancel adding this plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove plans.
health-insurance--cancel-edit-descriptio: If you cancel editing this health insurance plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove other health insurance policies.
health-insurance--delete-item-descriptio: This will delete %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--delete-noun-descriptio: This will delete this %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--plan-type-label: Which type of insurance plan or program are the applicant(s) enrolled in?
health-insurance--plan-type-hint: This information is on the front of the health insurance card.
health-insurance--plan-type-option--medi: Medicaid or a state assistance program
health-insurance--plan-type-option--othe: Other (specialty, limited coverage, or exclusively CHAMPVA supplemental) insurance
health-insurance--yes-no-title: Do you have any other health insurance to report for one or more applicants?
health-insurance--yes-no-more-title: Do you have any other health insurance to report?
health-insurance--yes-no-hint: If so, you must report this information for us to process your application.
medicare--cancel-add-description: If you cancel adding this Medicare plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove plans.
medicare--cancel-edit-description: If you cancel editing this Medicare plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove other health insurance policies.
medicare--card-upload-alt-text--back: Back of a red, white, and blue Medicare card. Includes card usage instructions and the Medicare phone number and website.
medicare--delete-item-description: This will delete %s’s Medicare plan and all the information from your list of plans.
medicare--delete-noun-description: This will delete this Medicare plan and all the information from your list of plans.
medicare--mbi-description: Every Medicare recipient has an 11-character Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) code. You can find this code on the front of Medicare cards or on medicare.gov accounts.
medicare--mbi-hint: You can enter an HICN if that’s what’s shown on the Medicare card.
medicare--participant-label: Which applicant would you like to add Medicare insurance for?
medicare--participant-hint: If you have more applicants with Medicare plans, you can add them later in this form.
medicare--parts-ab-card-title: Upload Medicare card for Hospital and Medical insurance
medicare--parts-ab-card-label--front: Upload front of Original Medicare card
medicare--parts-ab-card-label--back: Upload back of Original Medicare card
medicare--parts-ab-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part A hospital and Part B medical coverage.
medicare--part-a-card-label--front: Upload front of Part A Medicare card
medicare--part-a-card-label--back: Upload back of Part A Medicare card
medicare--part-a-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part A hospital coverage.
medicare--part-b-card-label--front: Upload front of Part B Medicare card
medicare--part-b-card-label--back: Upload back of Part B Medicare card
medicare--part-b-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part B medical coverage.
medicare--plan-type-option--ab: Original Medicare Parts A and B (Hospital and Medical Insurance)
medicare--plan-type-option--c: Medicare Part C, also known as Medicare Advantage (includes previous enrollment in Part A and B)
medicare--yes-no-title: Do any applicants have Medicare plans?
medicare--yes-no-more-title: Do you have any other applicants with Medicare plans to report?
medicare--yes-no-hint: If so, you must report this information for us to process your application.
ohi--section-title: Submit your Other Health Insurance Certification (VA Form 10-7959c)
validation--date-range--future: Date may not be more than 1 year from today
validation--mbi-invalid: Enter a valid 11-character MBI code (without dashes)
validation--ssn-unique: This SSN has already been used. Enter a different number.
